long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Influencer Analytics by Wobb

Unlock powerful influencer insights and connect with them directly from your browser with the Wobb Chrome extension

Key Features:
📈 Followers Count: Get accurate and up-to-date follower numbers to gauge an influencer’s reach.
📊 Engagement Rate (ER): Measure how well an influencer's content resonates with their audience.
🕵️ Fake Follower Detection: Identify influencers with inflated follower counts to ensure genuine engagement.
👥 Audience Demographics: Understand the age, location, and interests of an influencer's followers.
👍 Performance Metrics: Analyze metrics such as average likes, comments, reels play, and paid post performance.
🔍 Influencer Lookalikes: Find similar influencers to expand your reach and enhance your campaigns.

How It Works:
1. Disable Ad Blocker: Ensure seamless functionality by disabling your ad blocker.
2. Open Social Media Profile: Visit any social media profile in your Chrome browser.
3. Launch Wobb Extension: Click on the Wobb Chrome extension to instantly view detailed influencer performance metrics on a single dashboard.

Why Wobb?
📊 Data-Driven Decisions: Identify the perfect influencers for your campaigns with comprehensive performance analytics.
🔗 Seamless Integration: Easily access influencer metrics without leaving your browser.
🚀 Boost Campaign Success: Leverage precise data to drive impactful influencer collaborations.
✅ Ensure Authenticity: Detect fake followers to collaborate with genuine influencers and maximize ROI.
🎁 Free Monthly Analytics: Get 300 profile analytics free of cost every month to supercharge your marketing efforts.

Want More?
Go to Wobb.ai to discover and invite influencers in bulk, making influencer marketing easy.

🚀 Get Started:
Install the Wobb Chrome extension now and elevate your influencer marketing strategy with in-depth analytics and direct outreach capabilities.
